sentences.en: As everyone knows, meditation and water are wedded for ever.
sentences.cn: 大家都知道, 沉思和水是始终结合在一起的.

sentences.en: At length the lady of the caravan shook off her fit of meditation.
sentences.cn: 最后车上那个女子抛弃了她那一阵的沉思.

sentences.en: He had been a subject of eager meditation to Rosamond.
sentences.cn: 他已成了罗莎蒙德朝思暮想的人物.

sentences.en: He reached his decision only after much meditation.
sentences.cn: 他经过认真思考后才作出了决定.

sentences.en: I'm sorry to interrupt your meditation.
sentences.cn: 很抱歉,我打断了你的沉思.

sentences.en: Meditation tends to lower or normalize blood pressure.
sentences.cn: 冥想有助于降低血压或使血压恢复正常。

sentences.en: She found him sitting alone, deep in meditation.
sentences.cn: 她发现他独自坐着，陷入沉思。

sentences.en: She found peace through yoga and meditation.
sentences.cn: 她通过瑜伽和冥想找到了宁静。

sentences.en: This peaceful garden lends itself to meditation.
sentences.cn: 这个恬静的花园适于冥想.

sentences.en: This spectacle of another's suffering and sacrifice rapt my thoughts from exclusive meditation on my own.
sentences.cn: 看到别人的痛苦和牺牲,使我的思想不再完全沉浸在自己的痛苦和牺牲上.

sentences.en: Thus went my meditation on green sofa.
sentences.cn: 就这样,我坐在绿色的沙发上沉思着.

sentences.en: Yoga involves breathing exercises, stretching, and meditation.
